titles.title: A bill to renew and modify the temporary reduction of duty on certain low expansion laboratory glassware.
A bill to renew and modify the temporary reduction of duty on certain low expansion laboratory glassware.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of certain low expansion laboratory glassware, and (2) extend the temporary reduction of duty on such glassware.
